00008 int
00009 isinf(double n)
00010 {
00011     if (IsNANorINF(n) && IsINF(n)) {
00012         return 1;
00013     }
00014     else {
00015         return 0;
00016     }
00017 }

00030 /*
00031  * isinf may be provided only as a macro.
00032  * ex. HP-UX, Solaris 10
00033  * http://www.gnu.org/software/automake/manual/autoconf/Function-Portability.html
00034  */
00035 #ifndef isinf
00036 int
00037 isinf(double n)
00038 {
00039     return (!finite(n) && !isnan(n));
00040 }
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 #else
00044 
00045 #ifdef HAVE_STRING_H
00046 # include <string.h>
00047 #else
00048 # include <strings.h>
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 static double zero(void) { return 0.0; }
00052 static double one (void) { return 1.0; }
00053 static double inf (void) { return one() / zero(); }
00054 
00055 int
00056 isinf(double n)
00057 {
00058     static double pinf = 0.0;
00059     static double ninf = 0.0;
00060 
00061     if (pinf == 0.0) {
00062         pinf = inf();
00063         ninf = -pinf;
00064     }
00065     return memcmp(&n, &pinf, sizeof n) == 0
00066         || memcmp(&n, &ninf, sizeof n) == 0;
00067 }
00068 #endif
00069 #endif
